abstract: Pittsburgh is evolving from blighted city into major food destination, attracting young professionals to visit city and ultimately stay; influx of chefs is fueled by cheap rents, which allows them to take more risks in what and how they cook.

headline.print_headline: From Steel Town to Meal Town

snippet: The once-struggling former steel town is drawing millennials with innovative new restaurants and bars.
lead_paragraph: The once-struggling former steel town is drawing millennials with innovative new restaurants and bars.
